name: Lance
description:
LANCE

For now, a simple arcade action game. I will continue to update it with new enemies, levels, and a story as well as technical improvements as time goes on. Feedback is much appreciated.

CONTROLS

  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • LMB: Attack
  • LMB + LMB: Multiple attacks
  • Hold LMB: Spin attack
  • RMB: Throw lance
  • RMB with lance thrown: Recall lance
  • LMB with lance thrown: Teleport to lance
  • LMB while in the air: Aerial dash attack
  • Q: Toggle aiming reticle
  • R: Restart level
  • ESC: Close game

Controller is supported except for R and ESC.
